data.title: Property Tax Commission Decisions
data.meta_description: While every effort is made to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the decisions, orders, and opinions available on the North Carolina Department of Revenue
data.text:
While every effort is made to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the decisions, orders, and opinions available on the North Carolina Department of Revenue website, the North Carolina Department of Revenue is not responsible for any errors or omissions which may occur in these files. Please notify the Local Government Division - Property Tax's web editor if you find any irregularities in the decisions, orders, or opinions on this page. The web editor will relay the information to appropriate staff members to investigate the irregularities.

The North Carolina Department of Revenue offers access to the decisions, orders, and opinions on the internet as a service to the public. The web editor is unable to assist users of this service with legal questions. Therefore, to understand and protect your legal rights, you should consult your own private lawyer.

Please take into consideration that the list does not include all cases decided by the Commission. This is a partial listing as cases will be added periodically for reference.
